address.title: Address
address.content:
Soka University is located 4km north of JR Hachioji Station, about 20 minutes by bus. Hachioji Station is about 40 minutes from Shinjuku on the JR Chuo Line or Keio Line (private railway). It is also about 45 minutes from Shin-Yokohama Station on the Tokaido Shinkansen on the JR Yokohama Line. 
 1 Chome-236 Tangimachi, Hachioji, Tokyo 192-8577, Japan 
 住所：〒192-8577 
 東京都八王子市丹木町1-236 
 電話：042-691-2211（代表）
